Class TimeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.util.com.google.ical.util.TimeUtils

  • public class TimeUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with times and dates.
    Author:
    Neal Gafter

        public static int fixedFromGregorian(int year,
                     int month,
                     int day)
        the number of days since the epoch, which is the imaginary beginning of year zero in a hypothetical backward extension of the Gregorian calendar through time. See "Calendrical Calculations" by Reingold and Dershowitz.
